name: Never stop - Endless rolling!
description:
Keep moving ! Roll and jump - but never stop in this new addicting game! The longer you keep moving without getting stopped by one of the many obstacles or traps, the more points you get.

How long can you manage this thrill of speedp? Will you be able to beat the Highscore and climb to the top?

Features:
- Many different color schemes to unlock
- Speedy gameplay
- Unique graphic style
- Record your run with Everplay
- Compete with friends via GameCenter
